goal.en: This course is the second in a series of two, devised to improve upper-intermediate learners’ business communication skills with a focus on three aspects of the English language: speaking techniques, listening competence, and vocabulary power, in order of priority. Through choice skills-based coursebook and other task-based supplementary materials, students can learn to communicate real meaning in natural context, which offers them opportunities to further develop their background knowledge, critical thinking, managerial capability, in addition to the focused language acquisition. Upon completion of the course, students will be able to communicate more diplomatically, thereby more skillfully and effectively, demonstrating functional language in everyday business scenarios towards problem-solving ability.

content.en:
**Language acquisition takes time and effort on a regular basis.
**Our lessons and evaluations start from Week 1 for all students, the registered or the interested.
**Class announcements will be posted on new ee-class in due course: https://ncueeclass.ncu.edu.tw/. Students are required to follow the announcements posted on there on a weekly basis.
Weekly schedule: To be announced.
content.ch:
**語言學習需要定期付出時間與努力才易有成效。
**課程內容與評量始自第一週，有選上或有興趣加選的同學，都請準時到課，避免成績損失。
**課程須知會陸續公告於新ee-class系統: https://ncueeclass.ncu.edu.tw/，同學要每週追蹤網站上的課程注意事項。
